titulo: Your Will Shall Decide Your Destiny
descripcion: Anne arrives at Green Gables and struggles with fitting into her new environment.

titulo: I Am No Bird, and No Net Ensnares Me
descripcion: Filled with worry Matthew Cuthbert races to find Anne before it's too late.

titulo: But What Is So Headstrong as Youth?
descripcion: Anne is introduced to the inner social workings of public school, while Marilla is introduced to the inner social workings of Avonlea's progressive young mothers.

titulo: An Inward Treasure Born
descripcion: Anne and Marilla struggle with Anne's staunch boycott of the local school. A minister's backward advice has a reverse effect, causing Anne to fiercely challenge gender norms.

titulo: Tightly Knotted to a Similar String
descripcion: Anne is allowed to ask her best friend Diana over for afternoon tea, things start to go wrong when she looks for the Raspberry Cordial.

titulo: Remorse Is the Poison of Life
descripcion: An emergency occurs in Diana's family while her Mom is away.

titulo: Wherever You Are Is My Home
descripcion: The Cuthberts vow to do whatever it takes to save the farm, which reminds Anne of the strength of friendship and love.

titulo: Youth Is the Season of Hope
descripcion: The Cuthberts' boarders stir excitement with a question: Could there be gold in Avonlea? Elsewhere, Gilbert makes a new friend at sea.

titulo: Signs Are Small Measurable Things, But Interpretations Are Illimitable
descripcion: The steamer lands in Trinidad, bringing Bash face to face with his past. The Barrys get behind the gold rush, but Matthew and Marilla aren't so sure.

titulo: The True Seeing Is Within
descripcion: An adventure away with the Barrys teaches Anne to trust her instincts. Marilla begins to suspect that her boarders aren't as innocent as they seem.

titulo: The Painful Eagerness of Unfed Hope
descripcion: Anne writes letters as an "agent of romance" while Diana trains at home to be a lady. A life-changing encounter steers Gilbert toward his destiny.

titulo: The Determining Acts of Her Life
descripcion: A game of spin the bottle prompts burning questions about love and beauty. Anne and Cole bond over their differences as Gilbert makes his way home.

titulo: I Protest Against Any Absolute Conclusion
descripcion: Anne faces the world with a shocking new look while the town preps for its annual Christmas pantomime. Gilbert and Bash join the Cuthberts for dinner.

titulo: Memory Has as Many Moods as the Temper
descripcion: Cole accompanies the girls to Aunt Josephine's for a lavish party filled with surprises. Back at home, Marilla's health takes a worrisome turn.

titulo: Struggling Against the Perception of Facts
descripcion: With a wedding on the horizon, Anne wonders what kind of bride she'd like to be. Marilla sees an oculist, and Bash meets a friendly face in "The Bog".

titulo: What We Have Been Makes Us What We Are
descripcion: A brand-new teacher brings unconventional methods -- and a motorbike -- to Avonlea. Gilbert's plan to speed up his studies leaves Bash feeling lost.

titulo: The Growing Good of the World
descripcion: Anne rallies her friends to save Miss Stacy in the wake of a disastrous incident. Bash gets an unexpected gift, and Cole makes a surprising choice.

titulo: A Secret Which I Desired to Divine
descripcion: Anne's sixteenth birthday inspires her to learn more about her genealogy.

titulo: There Is Something at Work in My Soul Which I Do Not Understand
descripcion: Anne's search takes her back to the orphanage, where she's forced to confront new realities. Meanwhile, Elijah pays a visit to Avonlea.

titulo: What Can Stop the Determined Heart
descripcion: As Easter approaches, Mary's illness brings change to Avonlea.

titulo: A Hope of Meeting You in Another World
descripcion: Ka'kwet travels to school, while Anne embarks on the next phase of her quest.

titulo: I Am Fearless and Therefore Powerful
descripcion: A dance rehearsal generates sparks (and tension).

titulo: The Summit of My Desires
descripcion: The Cuthberts gain a new perspective on Prince Edward Island

titulo: A Strong Effort of the Spirit of Good
descripcion: Anne rallies the town to speak out against injustice.

titulo: Great and Sudden Change
descripcion: The students sit for the Queens entrance exams.

titulo: A Dense and Frightful Darkness
descripcion: Matthew and Anne journey to help Ka'kwet.

titulo: The Better Feeling of My Heart
descripcion: Anne steps into the next chapter of her life.
